amendment.description: To prohibit MCA monies from being used to fund projects that could displace US jobs or production, or pose an environmental hazard.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1189 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1189 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9195-9196; text: CR S9195) To prohibit MCA monies from being used to fund projects that could displace US jobs or production, or pose an environmental hazard.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1189 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1189 proposed by Senator Dodd to Amendment SA 1136.
